pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Normality Tests // Performs multivariate normality tests and graphical approaches and implements multivariate outlier detection and univariate normality of marginal distributions through plots and tests, and performs multivariate Box-Cox transformation (Korkmaz et al, (2014), https://journal.r-project.org/archive/2014-2/korkmaz-goksuluk- zararsiz.pdf).
